secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is an abstract concept, its first letter is in the second half of the alphabet, and its last letter is a vowel. The item's name must contain an even number of letters, but no letter should repeat more than twice. Additionally, the name of the item should be able to form the name of a month when its letters are rearranged, and the month should be a time of year typically associated with outdoor activities. The item should also signify a positive or joyous emotion, and its name should rhyme with a common 4-letter word.
